text: Carlos Manuel Vila Nova (born 27 July 1959). is a São Toméan politician. Vila Nova is the President of São Tomé and Príncipe. He was Minister of Public Works and Natural Resources from 2010 until 2012 and Minister of Infrastructure, Natural Resources and the Environment from 2014 until 2018. He was the Independent Democratic Action candidate for the 2021 presidential election.. On 6 September, he was elected president of São Tomé and Príncipe. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:African politicians
title: Carlos Vila Nova
